sdata.e: Textile News has a large following among those working in the textile industry.

sdata.e: Dietary fibre is good for losing weight.

sdata.j: マイクロファイバークロスは、↑髪↑↓かみ↓の↑毛↑↓け↓の１００↑分↑↓ぶん↓の１という↑細↑↓ほそ↓さの|↑繊維|↑↓せんい↓で↑編↑↓あ↓みあげられたクロスです。
sdata.e: Microfibre cloth is cloth woven from fibres as narrow as a hundredth of the width of a hair.
